creator: 🎖 Edelweiss
descriptionHtml:
Edelweiss Mobile Trading App: A modern trading and investing app for the Indian stock market.🎖

Fast, detailed and real-time live streaming quotes. Open an Edelweiss trading and demat account & dive deeper into the Indian stock market. Our award winning research gives you various insights, market news & updates along with stock recommendations to help you watch markets closely & give you better control over your money invested.📈

Trade in 3 Taps:
● Tap on Ⓣ
● Add quantity & fill out the details
● Submit your trade in minutes

Why Choose Edelweiss?

⭐️ Free to Download:

This investment app is free to download & use. Whether you’re a first-time investor or a veteran of the stock market, find all the tools you need to help you track, trade & invest across stocks

⭐️ The Ultimate Stock Trading App:

Trade in BSE India, NSE India, SENSEX, NIFTY, MCX, & NCDEX across equity, market derivatives, commodity, currency, NCDs, Mutual Funds, and e-SIP

⭐️ Technical Charting:

Your aspirations to become a pro-investor just got a huge uplift. With access to stock charts, candlestick charts and various other analytical indicators. Make sure you gain a competitive edge over other stock traders

⭐️ Track Trends:

With the market fluctuating every minute, don’t allow your pulse rate to reach an all-time high. Monitor and research the stock market trends closely and choose just the right investment option for you

⭐️ Alerts:

Get live market updates and alerts, so you never miss a chance to invest or trade across various stock markets

⭐️ Customisable Watchlists:

Customise your watchlist with a capacity of up to 100 stocks. Sort and save by change, change%, LTP & alphabetically

Key Highlights:

🔹 Clean UI and simplified login process help you get started on your investment journey

🔹 Make secure fund transfers from your bank to your trading account & vice-versa

🔹 Get live market commentary from the experts to help you make informed investing decisions

🔹 Set alerts for your stocks to never miss the targeted price

🔹 View top 50 gainers and losers in the market

🔹 Get latest market news on the go through the News Section

🔹 Gain insights into the Indian Stock Market with sections dedicated to Equity, Market Derivatives & Commodities

🔹 Track upcoming results and corporate actions on Event Calendar

🔹Get tick-by-tick charts to help you make the right decision on the move

🔹 Single tap access to Indian Stock Markets, Trade & Watchlist from any section of the app

🔹 Choose a landing page of your choice; from Watchlist, Home Screen, Markets Page & News

🔹 View historic charts of future contracts up to 10 years

Get the advanced technical charts, candlestick at your fingertips to determine the market trend. View stock charts across multiple chart types to gain a competitive edge over other stock traders

descriptionHtml:
📈 Invest & Trade to grow your capital with the Edelweiss Mobile Trading App
🇮🇳 Invest in the Indian Stock Market BSE (SENSEX) NSE (NIFTY)
👆 Start trading with just 3 clicks
⚡ Execute your BSE & NSE trades instantly
🔐 Secure & verified online share market & investment platform
🚀 Watch your shares skyrocket in real time with live share market charting
🗞️ Get live share market news & updates within the share market app
🔔 Get Nifty / Sensex alerts & notifications for your watchlist to never miss your target price
📅 Track the 52 week high & low for stocks & sector performance

Keep a close market watch with extensive sections for equity, stock derivatives along with a detailed option chain & open interest analysis for F&O trading. Track, trade & Invest in stock market & manage your stock portfolio better with our Share Market India Trading App

Why Choose Edelweiss?

Free to Download:
The share market investment app is free to download & use. Easy navigation for beginners & seasoned investors. Real-time stock market charts, investing options, & stock recommendations from our experts

Invest in upcoming IPOs:
Want to invest in an IPO? Invest in the latest & upcoming share market IPOs with Edelweiss, one of the best share market apps in India. Investing in an IPO has never been this easy. Track upcoming IPOs and current IPO status. Place your bids & track your IPO investment live with the Edelweiss Share Market App

The Ultimate Share Market App:
Trade & Invest in NSE India, BSE India, SENSEX, NIFTY 50, MCX, & NCDEX across equity, market derivatives, commodity, currency, NCDs, Mutual Funds & e-SIP

Technical Charting:
Get BSE & NSE advanced technical charts, candlestick at your fingertips. View stock charts across multiple chart types to gain a competitive edge over other stock market traders

Track Trends:
Don't let fluctuating trends in the stock market, allow your pulse rate to reach an all-time high. Monitor & research the stock charts & trends closely & choose just the right investment option

Alerts:
Get alerts & notifications when the stock reaches a certain price in a jiffy

Customize Market Watch:
Customize your watchlist, sort & save by change, change %, LTP & alphabetically & view the price-performance with a single tap

Demat Account App:
Start investing easily in minutes by opening a Demat account

Live Share Market News:
Get trending live share market news, stock market commentary, block deals, Sensex & Nifty price updates, national & international company-specific news to make investing decisions on the move

Fund Transfer:
Enjoy fast, secure & seamless fund transfer experience with Edelweiss Mobile Trader, use UPI payments for fastest transaction for trading & investments

- Gain insights into the Indian Stock Market with sections dedicated to Equity, Share Market Derivatives & Commodities

- Get the prices of Sensex, Nifty, SGX Nifty, USD, etc.

- Get tick-by-tick charts to help you make the right decision on the move with the BSE NSE India stock market watch

- Single tap access to Indian Stock Markets, Trade & Stock Screener

Want to invest via a stock market app? Here is where you can get the best online share trading app experience among all the share market apps India offers

Control your money by diving into stock market trading & downloading one of the best share market investment apps India has to offer. Invest in the Indian Share Bazar, across NIFTY, SENSEX, BSE & NSE India

Download the Edelweiss Trading App to master the Indian Share Market
descriptionShort: Sensex Nifty, BSE NSE Mobile Trading app. Invest in Stock Market & Upcoming IPOs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improvements to IPO Applications– Now apply upto Rs 5L via UPI
- Switch between Orders, Trades, Positions and Holdings easily with the new Orders & Positions screen
- Enhancements and bug fixes
